name: Hyper Fleet
description:
NOTE: Gamepad doesnt completely work in the options menu. and takes a few moments to be connected while in the menu. Still works no issue in game.

If the game doesnt load try reloading the page

HYPER FLEET
Fly around and Fight enemies! Gain the highest score possible before getting killed! A small arcade game I created to get back into game dev.  Fight enemies and dodge bullets. Gain the highest score and survive as long as you can.

Keyboard Controls

WASDMoveSpace/RMBBlast to delete bulletsLMBshoot

Gamepad Controls(xbox only)

Left StickMoveRight StickAimLTBlast RTShoot

Credits
Explosions by Will at Untiedgames

Font is Cooper Bits by rurr

Stary background by Glimmervoid (OGA)

Music by DavidKBD
